speaker: Crypt Steps
lines: You descend damp stone steps into the crypt.
You trail a hand along names carved into the rail.
A cool draft rises from below.
Your lantern throws short light against the corners.
The silence deepens as you go.
Metal chimes softly against bone somewhere ahead.
The family vault door waits at the landing.

choices.text: Veer into the narrow stairs toward the ossuary.
Go back while the count is still in your favor.
